text: 👏🏼💡 Congrats to the UAMS physicians recognized for their contributions to healthcare research! 💰🔬 It's great to see experts in their field being acknowledged for their dedication and hard work. 💯 The fact that they made it into the top 5% of those publishing leading healthcare research is truly impressive! 🤩 Keep up the amazing work, UAMS team! 💪🏼
